metadata.description:
I created the image to get people to always choose love. Its a Light painting.

The Choose Love Collection - dropping December 16th on KnownOrigin - benefits Choose Love, an incredible organization that works with people fleeing war, persecution & climate change, and are enormously effective for boots on the ground support for refugees through their creation of a movement of people putting love into action all over the world. 

*This NFT also comes with 2 tickets to the Choose Love Benefit Concert with James Blake on 12/15 at the Ace Theatre DTLA. Tickets may be transferred to anyone of your choosing.
metadata.name: LOVE
